name: MagicMirror
0:
”Alexa, ask Magic Mirror who is the fairest of them all me or Bob?”
”Alexa, ask Magic Mirror who is the fairest of them all Bob or me?”
”Alexa, ask Magic Mirror who is the fairest of them all Bob or Mary?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: magic mirror
des: Give Alexa the ability to use a magic mirror to determine who the fairest of them all is! Simply ask something like, "Who is the fairest of them all Bob or Mary?" You can also ask, "Who is the fairest of them all Bob or me?" The magic mirror will tell you who the fairest is between the two. When asking, only use first names.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
